00241        Q_ASSERT(m_elementsCount <= MaxSize);

00255 inline bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::SetElementsCount(int count, const Element& value)
00256 {
00257        if (count <= MaxSize){
00258               for (int i = m_elementsCount; i < count; ++i){
00259                      m_elements[i] = value;
00260               }
00261 
00262               m_elementsCount = count;
00263 
00264               return true;
00265        }
00266        else{
00267               return false;
00268        }
00269 }

00275        if (count <= MaxSize){
00276               if (m_elementsCount < count){
00277                      for (int i = m_elementsCount; i < count; ++i){
00278                             m_elements[i] = value;
00279                      }
00280 
00281                      m_elementsCount = count;
00282               }
00283

00331 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00332 inline void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::Translate(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector)
00333 {
00334        int commonSize = qMin(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00335        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00336               m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00337        }

00341 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00342 inline void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::ScaledCumulate(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector, Element scale)
00343 {
00344        if (m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount){
00345               int i = 0;
00346               for (; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00347                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00348               }
00349 
00350               for (; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00351                      m_elements[i] = vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00352               }
00353 
00354               m_elementsCount = vector.m_elementsCount;
00355        }
00356        else{
00357               for (int i = 0; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00358                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i] * scale;
00359               }
00360        }
00361 }

00364 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00365 void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::SetElementsFrom(const TFastVector& vector, const Element& expansionValue)
00366 {
00367        int commonSize = qMin(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00368 
00369        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00370               SetElement(i, vector[i]);
00371        }
00372 
00373        for (int i = commonSize; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00374               SetElement(i, expansionValue);
00375        }
00376 }

00402 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00403 inline Element TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetDotProduct(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector) const
00404 {
00405        Element retVal = 0.0;
00406 
00407        int commonSize = qMin(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00408        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00409               retVal +=  m_elements[i] * vector.m_elements[i];
00410        }
00411 
00412        return retVal;

00446 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00447 inline bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator==(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector) const
00448 {
00449        if (m_elementsCount != vector.m_elementsCount){
00450               return false;
00451        }
00452 
00453        for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00454               if (m_elements[i] != vector.m_elements[i]){
00455                      return false;
00456               }
00457        }
00458 
00459        return true;
00460 }

00470 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00471 bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator<(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector) const
00472 {
00473        int commonSize = qMin(m_elementsCount, vector.m_elementsCount);
00474        for (int i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i){
00475               if (m_elements[i] > vector.m_elements[i]){
00476                      return false;
00477               }
00478               else if (m_elements[i] < vector.m_elements[i]){
00479                      return true;
00480               }
00481        }
00482 
00483        return m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount;
00484 }

00552 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00553 inline TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator+=(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector)
00554 {
00555        if (m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount){
00556               int i = 0;
00557               for (; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00558                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00559               }
00560 
00561               for (; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00562                      m_elements[i] = vector.m_elements[i];
00563               }
00564 
00565               m_elementsCount = vector.m_elementsCount;
00566        }
00567        else{
00568               for (int i = 0; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00569                      m_elements[i] += vector.m_elements[i];
00570               }
00571        }
00572 
00573        return *this;
00574 }

00577 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00578 inline TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::operator-=(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector)
00579 {
00580        if (m_elementsCount < vector.m_elementsCount){
00581               int i = 0;
00582               for (; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00583                      m_elements[i] -= vector.m_elements[i];
00584               }
00585 
00586               for (; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00587                      m_elements[i] = -vector.m_elements[i];
00588               }
00589 
00590               m_elementsCount = vector.m_elementsCount;
00591        }
00592        else{
00593               for (int i = 0; i < vector.m_elementsCount; ++i){
00594                      m_elements[i] -= vector.m_elements[i];
00595               }
00596        }
00597 
00598        return *this;
00599 }

00703 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00704 Element TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetElementsSum() const
00705 {
00706        Element retVal = 0;
00707 
00708        for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00709               retVal += m_elements[i];
00710        }
00711 
00712        return retVal;

00716 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00717 bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::Normalize(Element length)
00718 {
00719        Element isLength = GetLength();
00720 
00721        Element proportion = isLength / length;
00722 
00723        if (qAbs(proportion) > I_BIG_EPSILON){
00724               for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00725                      m_elements[i] = m_elements[i] / proportion;
00726               }
00727 
00728               return true;
00729        }
00730        else{
00731               return false;
00732        }
00733 }

00738 {
00739        result = *this;
00740 
00741        return result.Normalize(length);
00742 }

00745 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00746 void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetMinimal(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector, TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& result) const
00747 {
00748        int elementsCount = qMin(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00749 
00750        result.SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00751 
00752        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00753               result.SetElement(i, qMin(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00754        }
00755 }
00756 
00757 
00758 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00759 void TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::GetMaximal(const TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& vector, TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& result) const
00760 {
00761        int elementsCount = qMin(GetElementsCount(), vector.GetElementsCount());
00762 
00763        result.SetElementsCount(elementsCount);
00764 
00765        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00766               result.SetElement(i, qMax(GetElement(i), vector.GetElement(i)));
00767        }
00768 }

00770 
00771 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00772 bool TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>::Serialize(iser::IArchive& archive)
00773 {
00774        bool retVal = true;
00775 
00776        static iser::CArchiveTag elementsTag("Elements", "List of vector element");
00777        static iser::CArchiveTag elementTag("Element", "Single vector element");
00778 
00779        retVal = retVal && archive.BeginMultiTag(elementsTag, elementTag, m_elementsCount);
00780 
00781        if (!retVal || (m_elementsCount > MaxSize)){
00782               if (!archive.IsStoring()){
00783                      m_elementsCount = 0;
00784               }
00785 
00786               return false;
00787        }
00788 
00789        for (int i = 0; i < m_elementsCount; ++i){
00790               retVal = retVal && archive.BeginTag(elementTag);
00791               retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_elements[i]);
00792               retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementTag);
00793        }
00794 
00795        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(elementsTag);
00796 
00797        return retVal;
00798 }

00804 
00805 template <int MaxSize, class Element>
00806 inline uint qHash(const imath::TFastVector<MaxSize, Element>& v)
00807 {
00808        uint retVal = 0;
00809 
00810        int elementsCount = v.GetElementsCount();
00811        for (int i = 0; i < elementsCount; ++i){
00812               double element = v[i];
00813 
00814               retVal = (retVal << 1) ^ *((uint*)&element) + 1;
00815        }
00816 
00817        return retVal;
00818 }
